ISSUE.TITLE: Recreate Queue on Restart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm stress test drone 0.4.0 and docker. If i forcebly restart docker and drone, build container may not be destroyed, and restart build does not work, because docker says that container with this name already exists. I think drone needs check for container existance before creating, and destroy it when rebuild.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: [code-1506] replaced edited timestamp on PR (#1198)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Feat: [code-1576] Add support to delete empty repository (#1195)
